column5: Recieved a phone call today from my oldest boy. He was all happy and laughing.It would seem that we are going to have a grandson added to the family.He is due, Dec 25. Boy I hope so,it would save on presents.LOL  Both Betty and I are so happy for them.The million dollar family.Just have to find the million dollars now.LOL   Thought we would share our happy moment with our friends.
Congrats to the family Brian...  Maureen
Make sure you spoil the little guy! Lotsa fishing with Grandad!!
Awesome Grandpa Brian Congrats to your family Jacques
Preggers???... I didn't even know they were married!!!
Congrat's to all Brian. Grandchildren are a wonderful thing!  J...
A new little face to stare up at Gramps, asking, please take me fishing! Doesn't get much better! Congrats to all! HH
Good stuff! You make a fine Grandpappy Brian!
